name: Teeth Orthodontics
description: Corrects misaligned teeth and jaws for a better smile and oral health.

name: Cosmetic Dentistry
description: Enhances the appearance of teeth through whitening, veneers, and other aesthetic procedures.

name: Teeth Cleaning
description: Professional cleaning to remove plaque, tartar, and maintain oral hygiene.

name: Cavity Protection
description: Preventive treatments to protect teeth from decay and cavities.

name: Pediatric Dental
description: Dental care specifically tailored for children.

name: Oral Surgery
description: Surgical procedures for complex dental issues such as extractions and implants.
